title: Fong's Pizza
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, American, Pizza, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Asian, Fusion, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A unique pizza place serves specialty pizzas with Asian influences as well as traditional pizzas. Two different vegan pizzas on the menu with Daiya cheese, which you can add extra toppings to if you like. Also offered are made-in-house crab rangoons, pizza rolls and egg rolls. Large selection of beer and cocktails but not labeled if vegan. Chinese decor in a fun atmosphere.
